name: Backpack Hero (Thejaspel, BinaryCounter, GangsRobin)
description:
Backpack Hero

----=[ ]=----

Delve into the dungeon with your magic backpack!

--=--

Use the mouse!
Right-click/arrow-keys to rotate items while holding them.
Get as far into the Dungeon as you can!

Join our Discord Server!
We want to expand this game further and we need your feedback! If you are interested in further development, please join us!
